Kashira:
Toraō (虎王)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (Honchō nijūshikō / 本朝廿四孝)

The Summer Festival at Naniwa (Natsumatsuri Naniwa kagami / 夏祭浪花鑑)

A Chushingura's Subplot (Gishi meimeiden / 義士銘々伝)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway (Tōkai dōchu hizakurige / 東海道中膝栗毛)

The Tycoon's Exploit (Ehon taikōki / 絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

The White Fox of Shinoda (Ashiya Dōman ōuchi kagami / 芦屋道満大内鑑)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Woman's Harakiri at Nagamachi (Nagamachi onna no harakiri / 長町女腹切)
